message: I would love to see a kynetx app with this much A) Complexity B) Design C) Usefulness
Kynetx apps rock. Now, go checkout https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/alelhddbbhepgpmgidjdcjakblofbmce#
yes this is a nice extension, i use it everyday
but doing that with pure javascript is impossible I think, for now
and even more hope with this : http://blog.webmynd.com/2011/06/07/how-to-create-a-browser-extension-that-records-screenshots/
I think it would be really amazing if KBX included a cross browser library that would utilize browser native functions to achieve things that can't be done with conventional javascript /html
that would be awesome. At this point, we are shooting for complete compatibility as good as we can get with the current platforms and IE.
